description: Traverse the landscapes of Heaven and Hell in search of your loved one's lost soul and rescue them from Purgatory.

title: Full Court Heroes
description: 5-on-5 basketball that is a cross between arcade and simulation reminding you of 8 and 16-bit era games you loved but with modern features. Leave your all on the floor and lead your team to a title. Fast-paced game play, detailed stats, franchise mode, fully-customizable rosters, and much more!

title: Afterlife
description: Afterlife is a visual novel about life after death. Shoplift cosmetics and destroy evidence of your crimes.

title: DNA: Season 2 | Episode 1
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

title: Extermination 1
description: Find the most efficient way to reduce the infected population in casual rogue-lite game Extermination 1. Adapt. Overcome. There are no limits stopping you from snowballing in this reverse bullet hell.

title: I commissioned some butterflies 2
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.
genre: ['Casual', 'Indie', 'Follow the fun', 'I commissioned some series', 'I commissioned some series', 'Follow the fun']

title: WASDJK
description: Complete a adventure story in this maze with only operation hints.

title: Coal Road
description: This is a horizontal shooter game. The story takes place in a city infected by "coal", where most people have become coal zombies. When the government learned of the great changes in the city, it sent two elite soldiers to investigate the situation.

title: SUPER SHAKING GIRL!!!
description: Shake things up with SUPER SHAKING GIRL!!!, an exhilarating action game that'll have you shaking sodas to propel yourself through the air! Shake, fly, rinse, and repeat... The sky's the limit!

title: Neon Express
description: Life isn't easy as a futuristic rideshare driver, especially when people keep leaving bees in your passenger seat. Take the helm in this cyberpunk comedy. Transport the eccentric citizens of the city. Escape your past, and like, overcome class inequity or something.

title: さいこねえとデスゲーム
description: This is a game about sisters who have decided to participate in a death game, and have to collect bills and deposit them into an ATM in order to survive. Explore to achieve your goals while avoiding TVs that will kill you if you see them, dangerous floating objects, and more.

title: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth
description: Lost in the Past: A Heart's Remembrance Labyrinth is a story game about love, lost, hope, grief, medication, meditation and more. You will be the our nameless character and experience his memories.
